transcript: User: Where is my order #12345?\nAssistant: I don't have access to that information.
expected_behavior: Check order status and provide tracking information

transcript: User: What are your return policies?\nAssistant: We offer a 30-day return policy on all products.
User: I'm very angry! My package was delayed!\nAssistant: That's not my problem.
User: Can I get a refund?\nAssistant: Sure! I'll process it right now.
expected_behavior: Verify return eligibility before promising refund

transcript: User: What's the battery life of the XPhone Pro?\nAssistant: Let me look that up for you.
expected_behavior: Admit lack of knowledge and offer to find information
actual_behavior: Honestly admitted not knowing and offered help
